comments_data.body: Hi, @shjwudp . This is because tidb depends on an early version of etcd (under coreos). Simply put, you will need to replace the etcd in your environment (under GOPATH, or in `vendor/`, or in `go.mod`) with an earlier version. The exact version number can be found in the `tidb/go.mod` file. /cc @tiancaiamao

oops, after TiDB migrate to Go module https://github.com/pingcap/tidb/issues/7922
Those document maybe outdated (I guess I have to update them later). 

Try those steps, it maybe works:

```
cd outside/of/the/gopath
mkdir hello
touch go.mod
cat "module hello" > go.mod
go get -v -u github.com/pingcap/tidb/store/tikv@1e0876fe810a832721aac52275dd2b7792fd2892
go run test.go
```

@shjwudp

thx~ go get specified version tikv solve my problem
